attributes.action: FORCE EVERY LOCAL COUNCIL TO SUPPLY A YOUTH CENTRE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE WOULD LIKE TO SUGGEST THAT THE GOVERNMENT MAKES ALL LOCAL COUNCILS SUPPLY A YOUTH CENTRE, THIS WOULD HELP THE POLICE AND KEEP THE YOUTH WHO HAS VERY LITTLE STAY ON THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE LAW, THEY SHOULD OPEN TO AROUND 11PM, THE CENTRES COULD HAVE ZERO RATES SO THEY ARE CHEAP TO RUN, MOST YOUTH TODAY HAVE NOTHING TO DO EXCEPT ON THE STREETS.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/localfacilities/

In any future petition submissions, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. More guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
